name: PublishCodeCovCoverage
description: Uploads code coverage reports to Codecov.io
author: Viscalyx

inputs.name: testResultFolderName
inputs.label: Test Result Folder Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the test result folder containing the code coverage report

inputs.name: verbose
inputs.label: Enable Verbose Output
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enable verbose output for the Codecov uploader

inputs.name: coverageFileName
inputs.label: Coverage File Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the coverage file (e.g., 'coverage.xml'). If specified, argument -f will be used with this file. If not specified, argument -s will be used with the test result folder path.

inputs.name: networkRootFolder
inputs.label: Network Root Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the root folder to help Codecov correctly map the file paths in the report to the repository structure. Sets the --network-root-folder argument when specified.

inputs.name: codecovToken
inputs.label: Codecov Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: The token for uploading coverage to Codecov.io. If not provided, it will look for the CODECOV_TOKEN environment variable.

inputs.name: coverageFilesSearchExcludeFolder
inputs.label: Coverage Files Search Exclude Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Folders to exclude from coverage file search. Passed as --coverage-files-search-exclude-folder.

inputs.name: recurseSubmodules
inputs.label: Recurse Submodules
inputs.helpMarkDown: Whether to enumerate files inside submodules for path-fixing purposes. Passed as --recurse-submodules.

inputs.name: buildUrl
inputs.label: Build URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: The URL of the build where this is running. Passed as --build-url.

inputs.name: jobCode
inputs.label: Job Code
inputs.helpMarkDown: The job code for the CI run. Passed as --job-code.

inputs.name: name
inputs.label: Upload Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Custom defined name of the upload. Visible in Codecov UI. Passed as --name.

inputs.name: plugin
inputs.label: Codecov Plugins
inputs.helpMarkDown: Plugins to run (xcode, gcov, pycoverage). Passed as --plugin.

inputs.name: failOnError
inputs.label: Fail on Error
inputs.helpMarkDown: Exit with non-zero code in case of error uploading. Passed as --fail-on-error.

inputs.name: dryRun
inputs.label: Dry Run
inputs.helpMarkDown: Don't upload files to Codecov (dry run). Passed as --dry-run.

inputs.name: useLegacyUploader
inputs.label: Use Legacy Uploader
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use the legacy upload endpoint. Passed as --use-legacy-uploader.

inputs.name: envVar
inputs.label: Environment Variables
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify environment variables to be included with this build. Passed as --env-var.

inputs.name: flag
inputs.label: Codecov Flag
inputs.helpMarkDown: Flag the upload to group coverage metrics. Multiple flags allowed. Passed as --flag.

inputs.name: branch
inputs.label: Branch Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Branch to which this commit belongs to. Passed as --branch.

inputs.name: pullRequestNumber
inputs.label: Pull Request Number
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the pull request number manually. Passed as --pull-request-number.
